update RTMR
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RCVBRNO = #{rcvbrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where REMDATE = #{remdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SNDBRNO = #{sndbrno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ENTSEQ = #{entseq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
